GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
PIRACY.
M/V ATTACKED IN 06-19.14N 003-24.55E AT 040024Z FEB.
VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY
REPORTING CENTER, PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
